scripts.test:storybook: concurrently -k "npm run storybook -- --ci" "wait-on tcp:6006 && test-storybook --url http://localhost:6006 --ci"
scripts.test:ui-snapshot: concurrently -k -s first -n "SB,TEST" "npm run storybook -- --ci" "wait-on tcp:6006 && playwright test --config ../../playwright.config.ts --project=ui-snapshot"
scripts.test:ui-snapshot:update: concurrently -k -s first -n "SB,TEST" "npm run storybook -- --ci" "wait-on tcp:6006 && playwright test --config ../../playwright.config.ts --project=ui-snapshot --update-snapshots"
